Module com.example.snakegame
Package snakegame.model.object

Class Snake

java.lang.Object
snakegame.model.object.Snake
public class Snake extends Object
Class representing the game's snake and its operation

    • grow

      public void grow()
      Add a unit to the back of the snake body with the coordinates of the previous last unit of the snake

    • detectCollisions

      public boolean detectCollisions(List<Unit> obstacles, int SCREEN_HEIGHT, int SCREEN_WIDTH)
      Return false if the first unit of the snake has the same coordinates with any of its body unit, any obstacle, or if it crosses the border
      Parameters:
      obstacles - list of all obstacles
      SCREEN_HEIGHT - screen height
      SCREEN_WIDTH - screen width
      Returns:
      false if the first unit of the snake has the same coordinates with any of its body unit, any obstacle, or if it crosses the border

    • teleport

      public void teleport(int SCREEN_HEIGHT, int SCREEN_WIDTH, int UNIT_SIZE)
      Relocate the first unit of the snake to a random new coordinates. If the new coordinates is within the distance of (3 * UNIT_SIZE) from any border, relocate again. If the new coordinates is within the distance of (2 * UNIT_SIZE) from any of its body's unit coordinate, relocate again.
      Parameters:
      SCREEN_HEIGHT - screen height
      SCREEN_WIDTH - screen width
      UNIT_SIZE - defined size of a single unit
